tv.name: Samsung 55" 4K TV
tv.description: Experience vivid colors and incredible clarity with the Samsung 55-inch 4K TV. A perfect addition to your living room with its sleek design and smart features.

tv.name: LG 65" Smart TV
tv.description: The LG 65-inch Smart TV offers an immersive viewing experience with its stunning display and smart technology. Enjoy all your favorite streaming apps in one place.

tv.name: Sony Bravia 50" LED TV
tv.description: Sony Bravia LED TV provides exceptional picture quality, deep contrast, and rich colors. It's the perfect blend of aesthetics and performance for your home.

tv.name: TCL 43" Roku TV
tv.description: Enjoy your favorite shows and movies with the TCL 43-inch Roku TV. With built-in Roku, you'll have access to thousands of streaming channels.

air_conditioner.name: Mitsubishi Electric Kirigamine Series Split 1.9 Ton 3 Star Inverter AC
air_conditioner.description: Mitsubishi Electric Kirigamine Series 1.9 Ton 3 Star Inverter AC with PM 2.5 Filter for clean air filtration, Dual Barrier Coating for enhanced durability and protection, Fast Cooling technology for quick temperature control.

air_conditioner.name: Daikin 1.5 Ton Inverter AC
air_conditioner.description: Stay cool with Daikin's 1.5 Ton Inverter AC, designed for maximum cooling and energy efficiency. Its sleek design complements any room's decor.

air_conditioner.name: LG Dual Inverter AC
air_conditioner.description: The LG Dual Inverter AC provides optimal cooling and saves energy, featuring an advanced compressor for faster and more efficient cooling.

air_conditioner.name: Voltas 1.2 Ton Split AC
air_conditioner.description: Beat the heat with Voltas 1.2 Ton Split AC, featuring high-efficiency cooling and easy maintenance. Ideal for medium-sized rooms.

washing_machine.name: LG 7 Kg Fully Automatic Top Load
washing_machine.description: LG 7 Kg Fully Automatic Front Load Washing Machine with Steam Wash, 6 Motion DD Technology, and Smart Diagnosis for efficient and gentle cleaning of all fabric types.

washing_machine.name: Samsung 8 Kg Fully Automatic Top Load
washing_machine.description: Samsung 8 Kg Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machine with Digital Inverter Technology, Wobble Technology, and Magic Dispenser for powerful yet gentle wash.

washing_machine.name: IFB 6.5 Kg Fully Automatic Front Load
washing_machine.description: IFB 6.5 Kg Fully Automatic Front Load Washing Machine with 2X Power Steam, Aqua Energie water softener, and Cradle Wash for delicate fabrics.

washing_machine.name: Whirlpool 8.5 kg 5 Star Semi-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine
washing_machine.description: Whirlpool 8.5 kg 5 Star Semi-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine with Magic Clean technology, 2x Drying Power, and 4 Years Comprehensive Warranty.

refrigerator.name: LG 260L Double Door Refrigerator
refrigerator.description: LG 260L Double Door Refrigerator with Smart Inverter Compressor, Multi Air Flow, and Moist 'N' Fresh technology for optimal food preservation and energy efficiency.

refrigerator.name: Samsung 314L Double Door Refrigerator
refrigerator.description: Samsung 314L Double Door Refrigerator with Digital Inverter Technology, All Around Cooling, and Twin Cooling Plus for enhanced freshness and reduced energy consumption.

refrigerator.name: Whirlpool 265L Triple Door Refrigerator
refrigerator.description: Whirlpool 265L Triple Door Refrigerator with Intellisense Inverter Technology, 6th Sense DeepFreeze, and Microblock Technology for superior cooling and freshness.

refrigerator.name: Haier 195L Double Door Refrigerator
refrigerator.description: Haier 195L Double Door Refrigerator with Stabilizer Free Operation, 1 Hour Icing Technology, and Diamond Edge Freezing for compact yet efficient cooling solution.

mixer.name: Sujata Powermatic Plus Juicer Mixer Grinder 900W
mixer.description: Sujata Powermatic Plus 900 Watts Juicer Mixer Grinder with Double Ball Bearing Motor, 22000 RPM, Non-Stop 90 Mins Running, includes 1750ml Blender and 1000ml Grinder Jar.

mixer.name: Sujata MG-01 1000W Mixer Grinder
mixer.description: Sujata MG-01 1000W Powerful Mixer Grinder with high-speed motor and durable construction. Perfect for all your grinding and mixing needs in the kitchen.

mixer.name: Sujata Multimix Juicer Mixer Grinder
mixer.description: Sujata Multimix Juicer Mixer Grinder with coconut milk extractor feature. Compact design with multiple jars for versatile kitchen operations.

mixer.name: Sujata 900W White Frootmix Mixer & Blender
mixer.description: Sujata 900W White Frootmix Mixer & Blender with powerful motor and sleek white design. Ideal for making smoothies, juices, and blending various ingredients.

geyser.name: Racold Omnis DG 25L Vertical Storage Water Heater
geyser.description: Racold Omnis DG 25L Vertical 5 Star Storage Water Heater with Black Digital Display, Touch Control, Auto Diagnosis, suitable for High Rise Buildings. Free Standard Installation & Pipes, Wall Mounting included.

geyser.name: Crompton Arno Neo 15L Storage Water Heater
geyser.description: Crompton Arno Neo 15L 5 Star Rated Storage Water Heater with Advanced 3 Level Safety, National Energy Conservation Award Winner 2023. Efficient heating with energy savings.

geyser.name: AO Smith Geyser 15 Litre 5 Star BEE Rating Storage Water Heater
geyser.description: AO Smith Geyser 15 Litre 5 Star BEE Rating with 2KW heating element and Storage Water Heater featuring 2X Corrosion Resistant Blue Diamond Glass Tank. Warranty: 7 Yr Tank, 3 Yr heating element & 2 Yr Overall warranty.

geyser.name: V-Guard Divino 15L Wall Mount Water Heater
geyser.description: V-Guard Divino Geyser 15 Litre Wall Mount Water Heater for Home with 5 Star Rating, Vitreous Enamel Tank Coating, Advanced Multi-Layered Safety. Suitable for Hard Water and High-Rise Buildings.

chimney.name: KAFF KEC 60A-DC 60cm 1400m³/hr BLDC Autoclean Curved Shape Chimney
chimney.description: KAFF KEC 60A-DC 60cm 1400m³/hr BLDC Autoclean Curved Shape Chimney with Real Time Display, 9-Speed, Touch & Gesture Control, 2 Years Comprehensive Warranty. Energy efficient BLDC motor with advanced auto-clean technology.

chimney.name: KAFF K-Series KES 90A Slant Filterless Auto Clean Kitchen Chimney
chimney.description: KAFF K-Series KES 90A Slant Filterless Auto Clean Kitchen Chimney, 90 CM, 1450 m³/hr Suction Capacity with Touch & Motion Sensor, 2 Years Comprehensive Warranty and Lifetime Motor Warranty. Advanced filterless technology with motion sensor control.

chimney.name: Sunflame Lancer 60 cm Chimney with High Suction Capacity
chimney.description: Sunflame Lancer 60 cm Chimney with 1250 m³/h High Suction Capacity, 1-Year Product and 5-Year Motor Coverage, Heat Auto-Clean, Touch Panel and Gesture Control, Baffle Filters for efficient smoke removal.

chimney.name: Sunflame Naples 60 cm Filterless Chimney
chimney.description: Sunflame Naples 60 cm Filterless Chimney with 1100 m³/h High Suction Capacity, 2-Year Product and 8-Year Motor Coverage by Sunflame, Push Button Control, 3-Speed Exhaust Fan for effective kitchen ventilation.

water_purifier.name: KENT Supreme Plus Alkaline+Copper RO Water Purifier
water_purifier.description: KENT Supreme Plus Alkaline+Copper RO Water Purifier with RO+UV+UF+Alk+Cu+TDS Control+UV LED Tank, Advanced RO Technology for Sabse Shudh Paani, Auto Flush, 8L, 20LPH. Ideal for homes with TDS up to 2000ppm.

water_purifier.name: HAVELLS Gracia Alkaline Max Water Purifier
water_purifier.description: HAVELLS Gracia Alkaline Max Water Purifier with RO + UV Hot & Cold, 7 Stage Purification, 7.5L Tank, Suitable for Hard/Soft Water. Advanced purification technology with hot and cold water dispensing feature.

water_purifier.name: Aquaguard Sure Delight RO+MC 1X Water Purifier
water_purifier.description: Aquaguard Sure Delight RO+MC 1X Water Purifier with Free Service Plan worth ₹2000, India's #1 Water Purifier, Suitable for Borewell, Tanker & Municipal Water, 30x Impurity Removal vs ordinary pitchers.

water_purifier.name: Livpure Allura Premia Water Purifier
water_purifier.description: Livpure Allura Premia Water Purifier with 2.5 Year No Service Cost- Filters Included, 10 Stage Advanced Purification, RO+UV+UF+Copper+Alk+Mineraliser, In Tank UV Sterilisation, 7 Ltrs capacity.
